name: Dashing for time
description:
Windows: dashingfortime.zip

Mac: DashingForTime.app.zip

If you are getting an error when you try to run it on mac: 

For Big Sur when you get a you don't have a permission to open the application error

open terminal.  enter sudo chmod -R 755 then drag and drop the application you are trying to open. click enter  then enter your password When opening the app on a Mac, first try control-clicking on the application and then select open.
